dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3460 IH: Chemical and Biological Defense Program Improvement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stewart (for himself, Mr. Curtis, Mr. Moore of Utah, and Mr. Owens) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 50, United States Code, to provide authority to include funding requests for the chemical and biological defense program in military budget accounts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chemical and Biological Defense Program Improvement Act of 2023.

section.header: Authority to include funding requests for the chemical and biological defense program in budget accounts of military departments
section.text: Section 1701(d)(2) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1994 (50 U.S.C. 1522(d)(2)) is amended by striking may not be included in the budget accounts and inserting may be included in the budget accounts.
